meta_title: Why UBM is the Maintenance Standard for 2026
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces to poor scheduling. Usage-based maintenance (UBM) solves this by triggering service based on actual asset utilization and data.
title: The Definitive Guide to Usage-Based Maintenance (UBM): Optimizing Reliability in 2026
